text: melum, maryamin kumarar isa, "israyil makkale! Enakku munnulla tavrattai meyppippavanakavum; enakkup pinnar varavirukkum'ahamatu' ennum peyarutaiya tutaraip parri nanmarayam kurupavanakavum irukkum nilaiyil allahvin tutanaka unkalitam vantullen" enru kuriya velaiyai (napiye! Nir ninaivu kurviraka!) Eninum, avarkalitam telivana attatcikalai avar kontu vanta potu, avarkal"itu telivana cuniyamakum" enru kurinarkal
